items.sentence: I never did figure out how to get to Tom\'s house.
I\'m surprised you and Tom don\'t like each other.
I wanted to talk more, but she just hung up on me.
I was laid off from my job due to budget cutbacks.
I went to the supermarket and bought a bag a rice.
From now on, let\'s do this the way Tom suggested.
I\'ll never forget the time we\'ve spent together.
I\'ll take care of your kitten while you\'re away.
I\'ll take care of your kitten while you\'re gone.
I\'m afraid that you\'re going to have to do that.
